article.title: General Dynamics Wins Army Training Support Contract
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: General Dynamics Information Technology, a business unit of General Dynamics, had been awarded a five-year contract valued at $387 million for constructive training systems support by the U.S. Army's Program Executive Office for Simulation, Training and Instrumentation. Under the contract, the company will provide technical, management and professional engineering support services for the procurement and fielding of constructive training systems.
